title: ''Content summary is auto-generated by mod-made script. Content summary may be incomplete, broken-
body:
or missing. This is not a Riot supported feature''

What exactly does this mean? Did a moderator create a script that automatically removes posts and threads for them because they're too lazy to do the the job themself? I find it hard to believe that a real human being can be this stupid so I'm assuming all of these removals were made by some malfunctioning automated garbage program that some wannabe programmer created.
